ComicInfo.Summary:
An American Tale, but one with a twist! Meet Prez Rickard, elected to the office of the Presidency in 1972! But how exactly does his victory tie into the plans of the mysterious Boss Smiley? "World's End" part 4.
An Asian man, not yet met in the inn, tells the tale of Prez Rickard. Teenage President of USA from an alternate Earth.
Outer story (pgs 1, 2, 24):
Penciller: Bryan TalbotInker: Mark BuckinghamInner story (pgs 3-24):
Penciller/Inker: Michael Alfred
